name: Luxurious Lips Lip Balm
description:
There is never a time for dry lips.  Ixora has the cure for you. I have combined a lovely concoction of Nilotica Shea butter and Aloe butter for extra moisture, some of your fave oils and a splash of soy wax and beeswax to create your dream lip balm. You also get to pick from an array of scents/fragrances.*

Ingredients: Nilotica Shea Butter, Aloe Butter, Beeswax, Soy Wax, Sweet Almond Oil, Soybean Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Vitamin E Oil, Fragrance/Essential Oil

*If you choose any of the pick options, you can let me know the scents you want in the Note to Seller section while paying via Paypal.

name: Cara Hermosa Butter
description:
Cara hermosa means "gorgeous face" in Spanish. That is what I set out to achieve when I came up with this butter. It is made with kokum butter which is a non comedogenic butter and light oils that will moisturize your face but will NOT clog your pores. It is great to use under make up as a primer because it helps to set your makeup beautifully. 

Cara Hermosa Butter with SPF not only does all this, but it will protect your face during the hot months while you are outside.

Remember, a little goes a long way.

Ingredients: Kokum Butter, Safflower Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Jojoba Oil, Argan Oil, Vitamin E Oil

SPF Protection
Ingredients: Kokum Butter, Safflower Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Jojoba Oil, Argan Oil, Zinc Oxide, Titanium Dioxide, Vitamin E Oil

2 oz

options.name: Cara Hermosa Butter w/ SPF 30  Protection

name: Tropical Fusion Sun Block
description:
The hotter months are here and while we are outside enjoying the sun, the beach, pool and any other outdoor activities, we need to protect our skin from the sun. Tropical Fusion Sun block not only offers an SPF of 30+, it also moisturizes you in the process. Proper and regular application should keep you well protected!

Directions: Apply the block on any area of your body exposed to the sunlight prior to going outside. 

Ingredients: Candelilla Wax, Nilotica Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Mango Butter, Wheat Germ Oil, Soybean Oil, Red Raspberry Oil, Carrot Seed Oil, Zinc Oxide, Titanium Dioxide, Vitamin E.

name: Blissful Skin Oil Cleanser
description:
Tired of using products on your face that dries your face out? Try this oil cleanser. Not only does it draw out all the bad oils out of your skin, it also keeps your face moisturized. It helps to reduce and prevent acne as well as fade dark marks while evening the tone in your skin.

Ingredients: Safflower Oil, Castor Oil, Almond Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Hazelnut Oil, Argan Oil, Rosehip Seed Oil Vitamin E Oil

Directions: Take a quarter size amount of oil, rub it into your face in a circular pattern for a couple minutes. Use a hot rag and place it on your face to open your pores. Wipe remaining oil off your face.

2 oz

name: Beautiful Cuticle Cream
description:
Need a cream to moisturize your cuticles and hands? This is the cream for you. It is also wonderful for reducing hang nails. Rub some of this cream on your nails and cuticles regularly and revive your fingers back to it's normal beauty!

You can use it during your manicures, or just putting some on during the day when you feel them getting dry. The choice is YOURS.

Ingredients: Lanolin, Nilotica Shea Butter, Beeswax, Apricot Kernel Oil, Glycerin, Jojoba Oil, Honeyquat* Vitamin E Oil

2 oz

*Honey has been replaced with honeyquat which adds  more moisture to your hair and dissolves even better.

name: Eclectic Mists Body Spray
description:
You guys have raved about all the Ixora options and asked my about body sprays for a while now. Who am I NOT to give you what you want?

The body sprays are available in all the scents Ixora currently offers!!

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Perfume Alcohol, Polysorbate 20, Glycerin, Fragrance/Essential Oil(s)

name: Enchanted Paradise Body Wash
description:
This lovely body wash is coupled with your favorite oils and nilotica shea butter to take you on an experience while in the shower. Not only do you feel clean, but it doesn't leave a film and your skin feels wonderful after the fact. This body wash is sulfate free, ph balanced and great for adults and children.

Ingredients: Mild Liquid Castille Soap Base, Aloe Vera Gel, Nilotica Shea Butter, Sweet Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil, Guar Gum, Liquid Germall Plus (preservative), Fragrance Oil (optional)

4 oz

name: Chocolate Fantasy Butter
description:
This is a Special Edition product that was made for those special occasions with you and your loved one. It features an edible butter is NOT for every day use.

Ingredients:
Chocolate Fantasy Butter: Natural Cocoa Butter, Organic Coconut Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Powdered Sugar, Organic Cocoa Powder, Flavored Oil (optional)

name: Ixora Sample Sets!
description:
Want to try different Ixora products? Don't know what you want? Well this is the option for YOU!.

You can pick any 3 Ixora products (2 oz size MINUS the scents) you want to try. All you have to do is note which three products you want in the 'Note to Seller" section on Paypal.

Happy Sampling!!

name: Ixora Gift Sets!!
description:
The holiday season is here! What better way to show your loved ones how much you care than by gifting them some Ixora products!

You will get the option of choosing 2 butters, 2 scrubs or a butter and a scrub. You can let me know which products you want and their scents via the 'Note to Seller' section via Paypal when purchasing the products.

options.name: Calming Nights Set (Lavender Nights Calming Butter & Lavender Body Spray)
Spice up Your Life Set (Pumpkin Spice & Everything Nice Butter, Pumpkin Spice Body Spray & Pumpkin Spice Lip Balm)

name: Ixora Face Trilogy Set
description:
This is the ultimate set for maintaining a clean, acne free and moisturized face. 

It comes with:

Blissful Skin Oil Cleanser which aids in reducing acne, dark marks and cleaning your face
Cara Hermosa Butter (also with the SPF Protection Option), which keeps your face moisturized without leaving your face oily 
Mon Bijou Sugar Scrub* which aids in reducing hyper pigmentation, exfoliation and leaving your face silky smooth

This set is great for men and women. Men especially will benefit who suffer from razor bumps.

*Please notify me in the Paypal Notes to Seller section of the scent you would like for your Mon Bijou Sugar Scrub.

options.name: Ixora Face Trilogy Set w/ Spf Protection

name: Palinoi Silk Body Custard
description:
Thicker than a lotion but not as thick as a butter, Palinoi will leave you feeling like pure SILK. This custard will also be great for those who have extra dry skin who need a water based moisturizer prior to using a butter. 

The Nilotica Shea, Monoi and Palm Butters aid in  free radical scavenging, cell regeneration, and to assist in moisturization after exposure to sun and other harsh elements. The oils used are great for moisturizing, and are light enough not clog pores or prevent the body from naturally eliminating toxins through the skin all while improving skin elasticity.

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Nilotica Shea Butter, Monoi Butter, Palm Butter, Emulsifying Wax, Watermelon Seed Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Jojoba Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Liquid Germall Plus (Preservative)

name: Whip It Up Shea Butter
description:
This butter is all about the Shea Nilotica Butter. It is softer and creamier than West African Shea Butter, and it absorbs into the skin and hair than its West African counterpart.  The added oils help aid dry skin, relieves eczema and skin rejuvenation. 

This butter also works really well to soothe the pain and itching from sunburns.

Ingredients: Shea Nilotica  Certified Organic and Fair Trade, Avocado Oil, Evening Primrose Oil, Aloe Vera Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Fragrance Oil (s) - Optional


4 oz, 8 oz

name: Whip It Up Shimmering Shea Butter
description:
This butter is all about the Shea Nilotica Butter. It is softer and creamier than West African Shea Butter, and it absorbs into the skin and hair faster than its West African counterpart. The added oils help aid dry skin, relieves eczema and skin rejuvenation. 

The shimmer adds a touch of glamour to your overall look.

This butter also works really well to soothe the pain and itching from sunburns.

Remember, a little goes a long way.

Ingredients: Shea Nilotica  Certified Organic and Fair Trade, Avocado Oil, Evening Primrose Oil, Aloe Vera Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Gold Rush Mica Powder, Fragrance Oil (s) - Optional

4 oz, 8 oz

name: Ash Today, Gone Tomorrow Butter
description:
Many of us are plagued by dry skin. Ash Today contains a Nilotica Shea Butter and Cupuacu Butter with a mixture of oils that is sure to moisturize the driest of skin. It also helps those suffering from eczema. 

Remember, a little goes a long way.

Ingredients: Shea Nilotica Certified Organic and Fair Trade, Cupuacu Butter, Aloe Vera Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Avocado Oil, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E Oil, Fragrance (s) - Optional

4 oz, 8 oz

name: Jumbo Combo Butter
description:
This product not only is good for dry skin, but it works for oily skin too. It moisturizes and easily absorbs into the skin and helps to fade stretchmarks and scars. On top of it being great for your skin, it keeps your hair moisturized for days. It is an all star butter that is also kid friendly!

Pregnant women love this product to reduce the itching while their tummy grows and to prevent stretchmarks as well. 

Remember, a little goes a long way.

Ingredients: Shea Nilotica  Certified Organic and Fair Trade, Mango Butter, Jojoba Oil, Tamanu Oil, Extra Virgin Unrefined Pure Coconut Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Argan Oil, Vitamin E Oil, Fragrance (s) - Optional


4 oz, 8 oz

name: Sweet, Soft and Sensitive Butter
description:
This butter was made for everyone with sensitive skin. It's mixture of Shea, Mango and Kokum butter will dissolve right into your skin. We mixed the butters with light oils and oils made to treat sensitive skin. It can be used on both dry and oily sensitive skin.

Ingredients: Shea Nilotica  Certified Organic and Fair Trade, Mango Butter, Kokum Butter, Grapeseed Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Extra Virgin Unrefined Pure Coconut Oil, Vitamin E Oil, Fragrance (s) - Optional

4 oz, 8 oz

name: Easy Greasy Eliminator Butter
description:
Suffer from Oily Skin? This butter is made for YOU. It contains butters and oils that moisturize but are also light and are easily absorbed into your skin to do away with that greasy or oily feel. it can even be used on your face to help keep the shine away, especially if you wear makeup. The oils in this butter are known to help with acne as well as regulate the amount of oils that are released from your body.

Remember, a little goes a long way.

Ingredients: Shea Nilotica  Certified Organic and Fair Trade, Kokum Butter, Extra Virgin Unrefined Pure Coconut Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Organic Hazelnut Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Maracuja Oil, Fragrance Oil (s) - Optional

4 oz, 8 oz

name: Distinguished Gentleman Butter
description:
This butter was made to moisturize the most driest of skin. Olive, Hemp Seed and Nilotica Shea butter are a powerhouse mixture. We combined them with the best oils that will have any man's skin feeling smooth, to complete his distinguished look! Men can also put this butter in their hair to moisturize it and keep it soft. It is great for twisting your locs with.

Remember, a little goes a long way.

Ingredients: Olive Butter, Hempseed Butter, Shea Nilotica  Certified Organic and Fair Trade, Aloe Vera Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Sweet Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E Oil, Fragrance (s) - Optional

4 oz, 8 oz

name: Sinfully Smooth Chocolate Souffle'
description:
Most of us grew up using cocoa butter for stretchmarks or to merely moisturize our skin. I brought a new spin to to the cocoa butter by adding extra virgin olive oil and evening primrose oil to help aid those with eczema. It is also great for scars. It is very light like a souffle' and melts immediately with contact to your skin.

Ingredients: Cocoa Butter, Organic, Evening Primrose Oil, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Chocolate Fragrance.

2 oz, 4 oz, 8 oz

name: Lavender Nights Calming Butter
description:
Have trouble sleeping? Have kids? Well this butter is a must have for you. This butter combines lavender butter and aloe butter which means you get the best of both worlds. You get the soothing feeling from the lavender and the added moisture from the aloe.

Ingredients: Lavender Butter, Aloe Butter, Jojoba Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Geranium Oil,  Ylang Ylang Oil, Patchouli Oil, Lemon Oil, Lavender Essential Oil

name: Orange Blast Invigorating Butter
description:
If you love all things citrus, then this is the butter for you. It gives such a refreshing feel. The orange butter paired with matcha green tea butter, lemon oil and grapefruit oil also aid in the defense against cellulite and aging of the skin. Matcha green tea butter is also good for deflecting UVB rays.

Ingredients: Orange Butter, Matcha Green Tea Butter, Wheat Germ Butter, Grapeseed Oil, Cypress Oil, Juniper Berry Oil, Rosemary Oil, Lemon Oil, Grapefruit Oil

name: Pumpkin Spice & Everything Nice Butter
description:
Behold, the fall is here. What better than to have a butter that represents it in every way possible. A butter that has the aroma of pumpkin spice with the moisture to protect you in the cold months. The pumpkin seed butter on its own is perfect for dried or damage skin, but paired with nilotica shea butter, it is sure to keep you smooth and supple all day. The oils added also aid in skin rejuvenation and moisture.

Ingredients: Pumpkin Seed Butter, Shea Nilotica Butter, Kukui oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, Jojoba Oil, Sesame Oil, Vitamin E Oil, Pumpkin Spice fragrace

name: Nurturing Nipple Butter
description:
Breastfeeding, although a beautiful experience, can cause pain due to cracked and sore nipples. This butter will help to soothe your nipples as well as prevent and heal sore ones. 

Directions: Apply when needed to moisturize nipples and/or when nipples are sore or cracked. 

Ingredients: Nilotica Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Calendula Oil, Vitamin E.

name: Rock-A-Bye Baby Butter
description:
Keep your baby eczema, cradle cap and diaper rash free while moisturizing them with this butter. It can be used from their hair down to their toes and is completely safe for newborns and up.

Ingredients: Nilotica Shea Butter, Aloe Butter, Apricot Kernel Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Emu Oil, Calendula Oil, Buriti Oil, Borage Oil, Neroli Oil

2oz, 4 oz

name: Macani Miracle Butter
description:
Do you need moisture? A small miracle? Well, this butter might be your dream come true. For naturals who have trouble maintaining moisturized in their hair, this butter is for you. This butter will also work on damaged relaxed hair. Macani helps improve the elasticity of your hair, and the honey is an added humectant that draws moisture into your hair, as well as peppermint oil to vanquish dry scalp and dandruff.

Ingredients: Macadamia Nut Butter, Nilotica Shea Butter, Illipe Butter, Argan Oil, Jamaican Black Castor Oil, Emu Oil, Honeyquat*, Peppermint Oil, Tea Tree Oil, Ylang Ylang Oil

*Honeyquat is now being used instead of honey for added moisture and also dissolves even better.

name: Avomur Nourishing Butter
description:
Mixed with Murumuru Butter and Avocado Butter, your hair will shine like it has never shined before. This butter helps to aid hair growth, gets rid of dry scalp, dandruff and works as a great barrier to keep moisture in your hair while giving your tresses a natural gloss. 

Ingredients: Avocado Butter, Murumuru Butter, Macadamia Nut Oil, Tamanu Oil, Fractionated Coconut Oil, Jamaican Black Castor Oil, Lavender Oil, Rosemary Oil, Neem Oil

2 oz, 4 oz, 8 oz

name: Loc & Twist Butter
description:
If you have locs or love twist/braid outs that are defined, this is the butter for you. Not only is it moisturizing, but it also offers hold to keep your hair in a desired look!

Ingredients: Nilotica Shea Butter, Hempseed Butter, Avocado Butter, Aloe Vera Gel, Coconut Oil, Jamaican Black Castor Oil, Macadamia Oil, Peppermint Oil, Teatree Oil, Vitamin E Oil

name: Luxury Kisses Lip Scrub
description:
Everyone loves kissable soft lips. I present to you a lip scrub, that will have your lips smooth, soft and ready for your favorite lip gloss or lipstick!

To add some pep, this scrub also gives an option of flavored scented oils!

Ingredients: Pure Cane Sugar, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Almond oil, Vitamin E Oil, Flavored Scent (Optional)

2 oz

name: Kissed By The Sun Moisturizing Sugar Scrub
description:
This moisturizing scrub contains demerara and white sugar as well as Nilotica Shea butter. When you use it, it feels like you have showered with lotion instead of water. It is great for any part of your body and those suffering from dry skin.

Ingredients: Demerara Sugar, White Cane Sugar, Shea Nilotica Certified Organic and Fair Trade, Vegetable Glycerin, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Vitamin E Oil, Fragrance (s) - Optional

4 oz, 8 oz

name: Mon Bijou Sugar Scrub
description:
I named this scrub after a neighborhood in St. Croix, USVI. It means My Jewels in French. It features brown sugar and oils that will not only softly exfoliate your skin but leave it moisturized. 

This is great for people with sensitive skin. The brown sugar offers a gentle exfoliation as the oils moisturizes it at the same time.

Ingredients: Dark Brown Sugar, Safflower Oil, Jojoba Oil, Argan Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Vitamin E Oil, Fragrance (s) - Optional

4 oz, 8 oz

name: Golden Rock Sugar Scrub
description:
Golden Rock was named after an area in St. Croix, USVI. 

This scrub is chalked full of goodies. The turbinado sugar crystals are bigger than other sugars so it takes a bit longer to melt which gives you a better exfoliation. The oils and glycerin together add a boost of moisture to your skin as you exfoliate.

Ingredients: Turbinado Sugar, Vegetable Glycerin, Extra Virgin Unrefined Pure Coconut Oil, Aloe Vera Oil, Argan Oil, Sweet Almond Oil,  Jojoba Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Fragrance (s) - Optional

4 oz, 8 oz

name: Peppermint Swirl Sugar Scrub
description:
This lovely scrub looks good enough to eat!! Great for exfoliating and moisturizing your skin as well as the peppermint that soothes your skin. 

Ingredients: Shealoe Butter, White Pure Cane Sugar, Extra Virgin Unrefined Pure Coconut Oil, Red Jojoba Beads, Beeswax pearls: white, Peppermint Fragrance

4 oz, 8 oz

name: Queen Vanilla Bean Salt Scrub
description:
This scrub is perfect for your feet. The dead sea salt is provides the extra exfoliation needed to soften feet. The Shealoe butter moisturizes as you exfoliate. Queen Vanilla Bean leaves your feet smelling good enough to eat!

To preserve your scrub, please do not use your hands to scoop out the scrub. Use a small scoop or spoon.

Ingredients: Dead Sea Salt Fine, Shealoe Butter, Evening Primrose Oil, Vanilla Bean Specks, NataPres Preservative, Vanilla Bean Fragrance Oil

4 oz, 8 oz

name: Exfoliating Crystals Sugar Scrub
description:
These colorful treats are sure to bring some fun to your home. The sugar cubes are multi functional. They exfoliate, cleanse AND moisturize at the same time. They can be used most places on your body especially the rough areas like elbows, heels, etc. 

Ingredients: Cane sugar, Shea Butter Soap Base, Nilotica Shea Butter, Sweet Almond Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Vitamin E Oil, Mica (optional), Fragrance Oil (optional)

2 oz, 4 oz
